SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.SUDO_EXECUTION
:set &nodeps# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_DEP_CHECK# = "YES" : set &nodeps# = "--nodeps" :endif
:set &noscripts# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_NO_SCRIPTS# = "YES" : set &noscripts# = "--noscripts" :endif
:set &nopreun# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_NO_PREUN_SCRIPT# = "YES" : set &nopreun# = "--nopreun" :endif
:set &nopostun# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_NO_POSTUN_SCRIPT# = "YES" : set &nopostun# = "--nopostun" :endif
:set &notriggers# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGERS# = "YES" : set &notriggers# = "--notriggers" :endif
:set &notriggerun# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGER_UN# = "YES" : set &notriggerun# = "--notriggerun" :endif
:set &notriggerpostun# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGER_POSTUN# = "YES" : set &notriggerpostun# = "--notriggerpostun" :endif
export LC_ALL=C output=`rpm 2>&1 -e &nodeps# &noscripts# &nopreun# &nopostun# &notriggers# &notriggerun# &notriggerpostun# &UC4RB_PACKAGE_NAME#`
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo "Package successfully removed." exit 0 fi
if echo "$output" | grep -q "package .* is not installed"; then !Rename UC4RB_RPM_FAIL_IF_NOT_INSTALLED -> UC4RB_RPM_FAIL_IF_NOT_INSTLED because it's longer than 32 chars <---start : if &UC4RB_RPM_FAIL_IF_NOT_INSTLED# = "YES" !Rename UC4RB_RPM_FAIL_IF_NOT_INSTALLED -> UC4RB_RPM_FAIL_IF_NOT_INSTLED because it's longer than 32 chars --->end echo "Parameter 'Fail if not installed' is set to 'yes' and the package is not installed yet." exit 1 : else echo "Package not installed." exit 0 : endif else echo "Other failure during removal process:" echo "$output" exit 2 fi
